statements: SELECT * FROM AssetUtilizationReports;
SELECT report_id, utilization_percentage, downtime_hours FROM AssetUtilizationReports;
SELECT * FROM AssetUtilizationReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT asset_id, utilization_percentage FROM AssetUtilizationReports ORDER BY utilization_percentage DESC;
SELECT asset_id, SUM(downtime_hours) AS total_downtime FROM AssetUtilizationReports GROUP BY asset_id HAVING total_downtime > 10;
SELECT * FROM AssetUtilizationReports ORDER BY report_date DESC, asset_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT asset_id, MAX(utilization_percentage) AS max_utilization FROM AssetUtilizationReports GROUP BY asset_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT asset_id, SUM(downtime_hours) AS total_downtime FROM AssetUtilizationReports WHERE downtime_hours > 0 GROUP BY asset_id
SELECT AVG(utilization_percentage) AS avg_utilization, DATE_TRUNC('month', report_date) AS month FROM AssetUtilizationReports GROUP BY month ORDER BY month DESC
SELECT asset_id, report_date, utilization_percentage FROM AssetUtilizationReports WHERE utilization_percentage < 50 ORDER BY utilization_percentage DESC, report_date ASC
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE utilization_rate > 0.5;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, start_date FROM assets ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, utilization_rate FROM assets WHERE utilization_rate < 0.2 ORDER BY asset_id;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Computer' ORDER BY asset_name DESC
SELECT asset_name, asset_location FROM assets WHERE utilization_rate > 0.8
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) AS total_assets FROM assets GROUP BY asset_type
SELECT asset_id, start_date, end_date FROM assets WHERE utilization_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY start_date
SELECT assets.asset_name, downtime.downtime_reason FROM assets INNER JOIN downtime ON assets.asset_id = downtime.asset_id
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization;
SELECT asset_name, utilization_percent FROM asset_utilization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, downtime_start, downtime_end FROM downtime ORDER BY downtime_start DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, performance_score FROM performance_analysis WHERE asset_id = 2 ORDER BY analysis_date;
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization WHERE utilization_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization ORDER BY utilization_percent DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_name, utilization_percent FROM asset_utilization WHERE utilization_percent > 80;
SELECT AVG(utilization_percent) AS average_utilization FROM asset_utilization WHERE utilization_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT asset_name, SUM(datediff(downtime_end, downtime_start)) AS total_downtime_hours FROM asset_utilization JOIN downtime ON asset_utilization.id = downtime.asset_id GROUP BY asset_name;
SELECT a.asset_name, p.performance_score FROM asset_utilization a JOIN performance_analysis p ON a.id = p.asset_id WHERE p.analysis_date = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization;
SELECT asset_id, utilization_percentage FROM asset_utilization ORDER BY utilization_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM downtime WHERE start_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_performance_rating FROM performance_analysis GROUP BY asset_id;
SELECT report_id, report_type, report_date FROM report WHERE report_type = 'monthly' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT utilization_percentage, asset_id FROM asset_utilization WHERE utilization_percentage > 80;
SELECT asset_id, COUNT(analysis_id) FROM performance_analysis GROUP BY asset_id HAVING COUNT(analysis_id) > 1;
SELECT A.asset_id, P.performance_rating, R.report_type FROM asset_utilization AS A JOIN performance_analysis AS P ON A.asset_id = P.asset_id JOIN report AS R ON P.analysis_id = R.analysis_id;
SELECT * FROM asset_utilization WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, purchase_date FROM assets;
SELECT asset_name, utilization_hours, utilization_date FROM assets JOIN asset_utilization ON assets.asset_id = asset_utilization.asset_id;
SELECT report_name, generation_date FROM reports WHERE generation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, analysis_result, generate_date FROM reports JOIN performance_analysis ON reports.report_id = performance_analysis.report_id;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type='Computer' ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, purchase_date FROM assets WHERE asset_type='Printer' ORDER BY asset_name;

SELECT assets.asset_id, assets.asset_name, asset_utilization.utilization_date, asset_utilization.utilization_hours FROM assets INNER JOIN asset_utilization ON assets.asset_id = asset_utilization.asset_id WHERE asset_utilization.utilization_hours > 100;

SELECT assets.asset_name, asset_type, utilization_hours FROM assets JOIN asset_utilization ON assets.asset_id = asset_utilization.asset_id JOIN downtime ON assets.asset_id = downtime.asset_id WHERE generation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT reports.report_name, report_type, generation_date, analysis_result FROM reports INNER JOIN performance_analysis ON reports.report_id = performance_analysis.report_id WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%high%' ORDER BY generation_date ASC;
